byline.original: Special to The New York Times

abstract: Pres Seymour, deans and student group urge immediate aid to Allies, petition to Roosevelt
snippet: NEW HAVEN, June 1--Three declarations on the war came from Yale men today....

headline.main: 600 YALE MEN ASK ALL AID FOR ALLIES; Seymour, Deans and Students Urge Quick Action by U.S.

lead_paragraph: NEW HAVEN, June 1--Three declarations on the war came from Yale men today.
